context.content: "Me Before You" is a romantic drama film based on the novel by Jojo Moyes. It tells the story of a young woman who becomes a caregiver for a wealthy young banker who becomes paralyzed after an accident. The film has lighthearted and comedic moments, as well as a heartwarming and emotional romance at its core. It's a beautiful blend of humor and heartfelt emotion.
